data/ph-top/2022/5/live-stream-polls.jso: An interactive tool to engage your audience. Easily customize a poll with predefined answers to get fast responses from viewers. Users use comments or FB reactions to vote, while the results are calculated in real-time and presented with cool visualizations.
data/ph-top/2022/5/expplore.json: Explore is a powerful Facebook™ Ads intelligence tool that allows you to target hidden Facebook™ Ads interests by using the latest AI-enabled technology that your competition is not aware of, and create massive ROI on every ad campaign!
data/ph-top/2022/5/array-builder.json: A free tool to visualize the output of array operations Provide an array, write code inside map/reduce/filter blocks & see the results live in the adjacent column. It simplifies writing blocks of code & debugging chained operations
data/ph-top/2022/5/leadmonk.json: First online appointment booking software in the market which lets your customers book time with you using their mobile number or email address without the back-and-forth emails or messages.
data/ph-top/2022/5/snipli.json: Ever wanted to share a file of your codebase and had to copy and paste the content and create a new GitHub gist? Presenting Snipli, a minimal command-line interface to create GitHub gists of your local files at blazing fast speeds ⚡
data/ph-top/2022/5/weavit.json: We suffer from information overload in a world filled with noise and yet we need to surface knowledge 'fast'. With so many productivity apps out there - why are none able to capture thoughts messily and organise them intuitively? Well...say hello to Weavit.
